comment._content: Wiki entry en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Taish%C5%8D The Taishō Emperor (大正天皇 Taishō-tennō?, 31 August 1879 – 25 December 1926) was the 123rd emperor of Japan, according to the traditional order of succession, reigning from 30 July 1912, until his death in 1926. Father of Hirohito.
